TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ControllerServices extends System.Web.Http.Controllers.ServicesContainer

Docs.summary: Represents a container for services that can be specific to a controller. This shadows the services from its parent . A controller can either set a service here, or fall through to the more global set of services.
